thread.title: H.S. football: Defensive Player of the Year watch for Oct. 12, 2015
thread.title_full: H.S. football: Defensive Player of the Year watch for Oct. 12, 2015

title: H.S. football: Defensive Player of the Year watch for Oct. 12, 2015
text:
H.S. football: Defensive Player of the Year watch for Oct. 12, 2015 October 12, 2015 Last updated: Monday, October 12, 2015, 1:21 AM The Record 
Defensive Player of the Year watch 
Jedh Downey, NV/Old Tappan, sr. LB 
Made seven tackles for the Golden Knights in a win vs. Indians Hills. Has a team-high 34 tackles (five for losses) for a defense that has allowed just 27 points in the past 12 quarters. 
Rashan Gary, Paramus Catholic, sr. DL 
Posted a sack and a tackle for loss in the Paladins’ win at Don Bosco. Has four sacks, five tackles for losses in past two games. 
Sal Mauro, Bergen Catholic, sr. DL 
Three of his eight tackles accounted for losses, and he recorded two sacks as the Crusaders topped DePaul. Has 26 tackles in six games, including 6 1/2 for losses. 
Isiah Tolbert, Passaic Tech, sr. DT 
Had another strong game (six tackles, two for losses) as the Bulldogs beat Fair Lawn. Has 37 tackles (10 for losses), 3 1/2 sacks and three fumble recoveries. 
Joe Williams, Pascack Valley, sr. LB 
Recorded five tackles and a sack, and batted three passes for the Indians in a win vs. Bergenfield. Leads team with 50 tackles, including 18 for losses, and six sacks through five games. © 2015 North Jersey Media Group Tags:
